280563.「その様子だと もしや……？: By the looks of it, if I may ask...?

280564.「はっ……はい！\n 王子どの ご所望の品……\n 風の結晶を お持ちしたであり:
Yes! Your Highness, I have brought the item
you requested, Wind Crystal!

280567.「じつは ヴェリナード王国では かねてから\n どんな悪天候でも 進めるような\:
The truth is that the Verinard Kingdom has
long been working on a Magic Ship that can
proceed in any kind of bad weather.

280568.「その船の動力として必要なのが 風の結晶でね。\n 世界中から探し求め たった今:
The ship needs Wind Crystal to power it. I've searched the world for them, and now they've arrived. With this, we can go survey the
sea!

280569.「魔法船は すでに\n ジュレットの町へ 運ばせてある。\n さっそく 向かうと:
The Magic Ship has already been taken to Julet
Town. Let's get going!

280571.「お前は 次代の王となる者。\n さらに こたびの異変調査の 責任者のはず。:
You are the next king. Furthermore, you are
the one in charge of the investigation into
the recent anomaly.

280572.「そのような立場にあるにも かかわらず\n お前みずから 大荒れの海へ調査に向か:
In spite of such a position, it seems very
rash of you to go out into the stormy sea to
conduct a survey.

280573.「しっ しかし……\n このような危機にこそ 責任ある立場の者が\n 先頭に立つ:
But...isn't it precisely in a crisis like this
that those in positions of responsibility
should take the lead?

280574.「それで お前に万一のことがあれば どうする。\n 異変の調査は……王を失った\:
So what if something happens to you? What
about the people of Verinard who have lost
their king?

280575.「何度言えば わかるのだ。\n お前は 自分の命の重さを 自覚せよ！:
How many times do I have to tell you? You must
realize the weight of your life!

280577.「まっ……まあまあ！\n 少し 落ち着こうじゃないか。\n ディオーレも オーデ:
Well, well, well! Let's calm down a bit. Diore
and Odis... huh?

280578.「……オーディス王子の おっしゃることは\n 王の心得として 決して 間違ってい:
Prince Odis is not wrong in what he says, as a
king should know. But...

280579.「……いいんだ セーリア。\n たしかに 母上のほうが正しい。\n 僕は 同行す:
It's okay, Celia. My mother is right. I
shouldn't go with you...

280580.「心配ありません オーディス王子。\n 私たちに お任せください！:
Don't worry, Prince Odis. We'll take care of
it!

280581.「王子もご存じのとおり ここにいるのは\n 暴君バサグランデをはじめ 数々の脅威:
As the prince knows, here is a great hero who
has defeated the tyrant Bogan and many other
threats.

280582.「必ずや 謎の歌が聞こえるという\n 海域の調査を成しとげ\n 今回の異変も 解:
I am sure that they will be able to
investigate the area where the mysterious song
can be heard and solve this anomaly.

280583.「……あっ 申しおくれました。\n 私は <pc>に お仕えしている\n ユーラ:
Oh, I'm sorry. My name is Yuliza, and I work
for <pc>.

280584.「そうか……ありがとう ユーライザ君。\n <pc>君 すまないが\n また 君:
Well...thank you, Yuliza. <pc> I'm
sorry, but I'm going to need your help again.

280587.「ジュレットの町の 桟橋に\n デーラという名の男が いるはずだ。\n 彼に そ:
There should be a man named Della at the pier
in Julet Town. Give it to him.

280588.「デーラは 魔法船の船長だ。\n 風の結晶さえあれば 大嵐の中も進めるだろう。\:
Della is the captain of a Magic Ship. As long
as she has Wind Crystal, she will be able to
sail through the storm. I'm counting on you.

280590.「これは 英雄リナーシェの魂！\n ですが……輝きが弱い。どうやら これは\n:
This is the soul of our hero, Linashe! But...
the shine is weak. It seems that this is a
piece of Linashe's soul... a fragment.

280592.「あ…あなたは 盟友さま……それに天使さまも。\n わたくしは 何を……ここは:
You, my ally, and the angel. What am I doing
here?

280593.「やはり リナーシェなのですね。\n 神化の儀が失敗し あなたは悪神となった。\:
You are Linashe, after all. The deification
ritual failed and you became a fiend. Do you
remember what happened after that?

280595.「リナーシェ！？\n いえ……あれは ただの幻影ですね。: Linashe! No...that was just an illusion.

280596.「そう……あれは まぼろし。\n わたくしが生きた時代の 記憶……。:
Yes...it was a blur. A memory of a time when I
lived...

280597.「６００年前のウェナ諸島は\n コルレーン王国と ジュレド王国という\n ふたつ:
Six hundred years ago, the Wena Islands were
divided between two kingdoms, the Kingdom of
Colrain and the Kingdom of Juled.

280598.「わたくしは コルレーン王国の女王でしたが\n この日は ジュレド王国を\n 訪:
I was the queen of the Kingdom of Colrain, but
on this particular day I was visiting the
Juled Kingdom...

280601.<center>……水に生まれ 水と生きる。\nそれが我ら ウェディの民。:
...Born in the water, live with the water. We
are the people of Weddie.

280602.<center>母なる水に祈りを捧げ\n我らは求める 神の慈愛を。\n水が育む:
Praying to Mother Water, we ask for God's
mercy. We pray for the bountiful blessings
that the water nurtures.

280603.<center>大いなる水の神よ。\n我らの思い 我らの願い\nかなえたまえ 守:
O great God of water! Fulfill our desire,
grant our wish, protect us...

280604.「おお……畑が……！\n こんなに立派な作物は 見たことがない！\n 奇跡だ！:
Oh... a field! I've never seen such a
magnificent crop! It's a miracle!

280605.「これで家族を 飢え死にさせずに済む……！\n ありがとうございます！\n あり:
Now my family won't starve to
death...! Thank you! Thank you...!

280606.「これが 水に 聖なる加護を与えるという\n 育みの歌……。よもや 地中の水脈を:
This is the nurturing song of the sacred blessing of water... which, through the veins of water in the earth, can bring crops to bear
in a withered field.

280607.「土地のやせた このウェナ諸島において\n これほどの 実りが……なんと\n す:
How wonderful it is that here in the barren
land of the Wena Islands, there should be such
a harvest! Hey, brother!

280608.「そうだな カルーモ。\n 目の前の光景が まだ信じられないよ。\n リナーシェ:
You're right, Carumo. I still can't believe
what I'm seeing before my eyes. The power of
your singing is a miracle.

280609.「我が民のため コルレーン王国から はるばる\n おいでいただき このヴィゴレー:
As King of Juled, I, Vigoray, thank you from the bottom of my heart for coming all the way from the Kingdom of Colrain to serve my
people.

280610.「いいえ ヴィゴレーさま。\n 我が夫となる あなたさまのためでしたら\n わた:
No, Mister Vigoray. I would go anywhere for
you, my husband <heart>.

280611.「それに あなたの民は\n わたくしの民でも ありますもの。: Besides, your people are also my people.

280612.「あなたのジュレド王国と\n わたくしのコルレーン王国を 統合して\n 誕生する:
A new kingdom to be created by merging your
Juled Kingdom with my Colrain Kingdom...

280613.「その王妃となる わたくしが\n 王のため 民のために 尽くすのは\n 当然のこ:
It is only natural that I, as their queen,
should devote myself to the service of the
king and the people.

280614.「貴女のような方を 王妃に戴けるなんて\n 民は 幸せですね。\n ほかの誰より:
The people are so lucky to have a queen like
you. I, more than anyone else...

280615.「新しい城が完成した あかつきには\n 建国と 私たちの結婚を祝う 盛大な式典を:
When the new castle is completed, we will hold a grand ceremony to celebrate the founding of our country and our marriage. I can't wait for
that day...

280616.「兄上とリナーシェ様の 結婚式……。\n おふたりの姿を 想像しただけで\n 僕:
Just the thought of my brother and Linashe's
wedding fills my heart with joy.

280617.「おっと カルーモ。お前が見たいのは\n 花嫁姿のリナーシェ殿だけだろう？:
Oops, Carumo. All you want to see is the
bridal gown of Lady Linashe, don't you?

280618.「なっ 何をおっしゃるのですか 兄上！\n そんなことは……！:
What are you talking about, brother? That's
not...!

280619.「まあ ヴィゴレーさま。あまり からかっては\n 弟君が かわいそうですわ。: Oh, Mr. Vigoray. Don't tease him too much.

280620.「カルーモさまも あなたさまの治世を\n より良きものにしたいと願う わたくしの:
Carumo, you are my comrade who wishes to make
your reign a better one. Please be at ease
<heart>.

280621.「ははっ それは頼もしいことだ！\n ……カルーモよ。お前も リナーシェ殿と共に:
Ha ha! That's something I can count on!
Carumo. You too, along with Linashe, will
stand by my side and support me.

280623.「……すべては まぼろし。\n 二度とは戻らぬ 過去の記憶……。:
All is a blur. Memories of the past that will
never return.

280625.「魂の破片でしか ないせいか……\n もう これ以上は\n 何も語ってくれないよ:
Perhaps it's because it's only a piece of her
soul... but it doesn't seem to tell us
anything more.

280626.「原因は わかりませんが リナーシェの魂は\n バラバラに 分散してしまったよう:
I don't know how, but Linashe's soul seems to
have been dispersed into pieces. I'll take
care of the pieces.

280627.「悪神化の呪いは 過去の記憶や 心の傷に干渉し\n 怒りや憎悪を あおるもの。…:
The Fiend's Flame is something that interferes with past memories and emotional scars, stirring up anger and hatred. Perhaps
the memory I just saw has something to do with the curse.

280628.「ほかの 魂の破片も集めれば\n 呪いを解く方法が わかるかもしれません。\n:
If we collect other soul fragments, we may be able to figure out how to break the curse. Let's keep going, looking for more of the
same.

280629.「ここは わたくしの私室です。\n わたくしが 部屋に戻ると\n いつも あの子:
This is my private room. Whenever I came back
to my room, she always came...

280631.「ただいま アリア。\n わたくしが留守の間 いい子にしていましたか？:
I'm home, Aria. Have you been a good girl
while I was gone?

280632.「うんっ。ちゃんと お姉ちゃんの代理で\n 町の人の訴えを 聞いたりしてたよ！:
Yeah. I was listening to the townspeople's
complaints on behalf of my sister!

280633.「……裸足で そこらへん歩いて\n お行儀が悪い！ って\n じいやに怒られたり:
...it's bad manners to walk around barefoot!
My grandfather would sometimes get angry with
me.

280634.「ふふっ。女王代行 おつかれさまでした。\n みな 変わりなかったようで 何より:
Hehe. Acting Queen, thank you for your
hard work. I'm glad to hear that everyone
is doing well.

280635.「お姉ちゃんのほうこそ どうだったの？\n 育みの歌は……うまくいった？:
How did it go with you, sister? Did your
song... go well?

280636.「ええ。\n ジュレドの方々にも……ヴィゴレーさまにも\n よろこんで いただけ:
Yes. The people of Juled... and Vigoray were
very pleased.

280638.「……アリア。\n わたくしと ヴィゴレーさまの婚姻が\n まだ 許せませんか？:
Aria. Do you still not approve of the marriage
between me and the Lord Vigoray?

280639.「当たり前だよ！ だって コルレーンと\n ジュレドは 何百年も 敵対してて……:
Of course they did! Because Colrain and Juled
have been enemies for hundreds of years and
they killed your father!

280640.「あたしは 小さかったから あんまり\n 覚えてないけど……あいつら\n 休戦の:
I was small, so I don't remember much, but...
they broke the truce and attacked, didn't
they?

280641.「ジュレド軍は なんとか追い返したけど\n 勇敢な戦士だった お父さまは 死んじ:
Juled's army managed to drive them back, but
your father, a brave warrior, is dead. I can't
allow you to marry that man!

280642.「……そうですね。コルレーン王国と\n ジュレド王国の間には あまりに深い\n:
...Yes, it is. There is too much deep anger
and hatred lying between the Colrain and Juled
Kingdoms...

280643.「ですが 殺し合いをしたのは 先代の王たち。\n その子である ヴィゴレーさまと:
But it was the kings of the previous generation who killed each other. His son, Vigoray, and I have chosen to put aside our
grudges and join hands.

280644.「そもそも 二国が争うのは\n 土地のやせた ウェナ諸島の中で\n わずかな実り:
The two countries are fighting each other
because they are competing for what little
they have in the barren Wena Islands...

280645.「わたくしが作った 育みの歌のチカラがあれば\n 豊かな実りを もたらすことがで:
With the power of my nurturing songs, we can
bring forth abundant harvests. There is no
longer any reason to fight.

280646.「それで 歌を唄ってほしければ\n コルレーンとジュレドを 対等な立場で\n ひ:
So you threatened to unite Colrain and Juled
as equals if you wanted them to sing?

280647.「交渉……と 言いなさい。\n ふたつの国が ひとつになれば\n もう奪い合うこ:
Negotiations... say. When two countries become
one, there will be no more competition.

280648.「交渉なんかしないで 戦って\n ジュレドをやっつけちゃえば よかったんだよ！\:
You should have fought and defeated Juled
instead of negotiating! With you, war is a
piece of cake!

280649.「たしかに わたくしの歌のチカラを\n 戦いに用いれば 勝利も たやすいでしょう:
It is true that if you use the power of my
songs in battle, victory will be easy. But...
in a war, there will always be blood.

280650.「誰かの恋人が 誰かの父親を殺し\n やがて 誰かの夫に 殺される……。:
Someone's Lover kills someone's father, and
then someone's husband kills someone else...

280652.「お姉ちゃんは 誰より立派な 女王さまだね。\n あたしは お姉ちゃんのことを\:
You are the most admirable queen of all. I'm
proud of you...

280653.「でも お姉ちゃん自身の 幸せは？\n 好きでもない人と 結婚しなきゃいけないな:
But what about your own happiness? Having to
marry someone you don't even like? That's
terrible!

280654.「たしかに 完全なる 政略結婚ね。\n けど ヴィゴレーさまは すてきな方よ？\:
It's true, it's a perfect marriage of
convenience. But Vigoray is a wonderful man.
I'm happy to be his wife.

280655.「だけど……\n かわいい妹に お祝いしてもらえないと\n お姉ちゃん とっても:
But... I need my cute little sister to
congratulate me, or I'll be very sad.

280656.「その言い方は ズルいよ……。\n わかった。お姉ちゃんを困らせちゃって\n ゴ:
It's not fair to talk like that... I'm sorry I
bothered you, sister.

280657.「そぉだっ！ お姉ちゃん 長旅で疲れたでしょ？\n すっごく甘い フルーツが あ:
That's it! You must be tired from your long
trip. I have some very sweet fruit! I'll bring
you some!

280658.「あなたは 何も心配しなくていいのよ。\n 私が すべて 上手くやってみせるから:
You don't have to worry about a thing. I'll
take care of everything.

280659.「……愛していた。\n 本当に 愛していたのに……。: ...I loved her. I really loved her....

280662.「これは 本当に 呪いによって呼び起こされた\n リナーシェにとっての いまわし:
Is this really a haunting memory for Linashe,
evoked by the curse?

280663.「私には 美しい思い出にしか 見えませんが……\n とりあえず 先に進んで\n:
It seems like a beautiful memory to me... but
for now, let's move on and try to capture her
memory.

280664.「教えてください リナーシェ。\n あなたの記憶の何が あなたの心を\n さいな:
Tell me, Linashe. What is it about your memory
that is nagging at your mind?

280665.「あなたは ウェナ諸島を救ったのでしょう。\n 輝かしい過去が なにゆえ\n あ:
You saved the Wena Islands. Why does your
glorious past cause you so much pain?

280666.「苦しませる？ わたくしを？\n わたくしの……過去……？: Do I suffer? Me? My... past...?

280667.「ああ 嫌……！\n 見たくない。思いだしたくない。\n こんなもの……！:
Oh, no...! I don't want to see it. I don't
want to remember. This thing...!

280668.「ご紹介いたします カルーモさま。\n あなたの義妹となる アリアです。:
May I introduce to you, Mr. Carumo. This is
Aria, your sister-in-law.

280669.「……お初にお目にかかります カルーモさま。\n アリアと申します。\n どうぞ:
...It is my pleasure to meet you for the first
time, Mr. Carumo. My name is Aria. Please
allow me to make your acquaintance.

280670.「初めまして アリア……と呼んでいいかな？\n 僕のこともカルーモと 気安く呼ん:
Nice to meet you, Aria...may I call you Aria?
You can call me Carumo, too. I would be happy
if you could get along with me.

280672.「では お言葉に甘えましょう。\n 迎えにきてくださって ありがとうございます\:
Well, let me take you at your word. Thank you
for picking me up, Carumo. How are things at
the castle?

280673.「はい！ 完成した 新しい王城は\n まるで 夢のように美しく……\n 早く お:
Yes! The new royal castle is as beautiful
as a dream and I can't wait to take you two
there!

280674.「ふふっ それは楽しみです。……かの地までは\n きびしい旅に なるかもしれませ:
I'm looking forward to it. It may be a tough
journey to the other side, but I'll be
counting on you to protect me along the way.

280675.「……はい。王たちが 協定に署名したところで\n 民が 恨みや憎しみを 忘れるわ:
Yes. The kings signing the pact does not mean that the people will forget their grudges and hatreds. That would be the same for Juled
and Colrain.

280676.「ですが リナーシェ様のことは\n 僕の命に代えても 必ず 守りとおします。:
But I will protect you, Linashe, even if it
costs me my life.

280677.「……ジュレドの方に そこまで\n 言っていただけるとは 思いませんでした。: I didn't expect Juled to say that much.

280678.「リナーシェ様は 育みの歌で 恵みをもたらし\n 戦争ではなく 歌のチカラによっ:
Linashe is the one who brought blessings through his nurturing songs, who united the Wena Islands not through war but through the
power of song.

280679.「まさに 我らウェディの 救世主！\n 僕は リナーシェ様を 本当に……\n 心:
Our very own Weddie savior! I have the utmost
respect for you, Lady Linashe.

280681.「ふっふーん！ なかなか\n 話がわかるようだね カルーモくんは！:
Mmm-hmm! You seem to know your stuff, Mr.
Carumo!

280682.「ははは。おほめいただき 光栄だよ。\n アリアも 育みの歌を唄えるのかい？:
Ha-ha-ha. I am honored by your praise. Can
Aria sing a nurturing song too?

280683.「歌自体は 誰にでも唄えるが その効力が\n 発揮されるのは コルレーン王家の血:
The song itself can be sung by anyone, but
I've heard that it is only effective when sung
by a person of Colrain royal blood.

280684.「そーだね。あたしも 育みの歌を唄って\n 水に 加護を与えることはできるよ。\:
That's right. I can sing nurturing songs and
give blessings to the water. I can also bring
forth fruit through the water.

280685.「でも お姉ちゃんみたく 作物を いっぺんに\n 実らせるほどの 効果は出ないん:
But it's not effective enough to produce a
crop all at once like my sister's. I think my
sister's power is special.

280686.「歌とは 心……。\n 思いと願いが 織りなす調べ。:
A song is a melody woven from the heart,
thoughts, and wishes.

280687.「王家の血に宿りし 歌声のチカラを 最大限\n 発揮するための 旋律と言葉の 組:
The combination of melody and words to maximize the power of the singing voice, which is in the blood of the royal family, is the
song I create.

280688.「我らの血を引く者が 育みの歌を唄えば\n 特別に 強いチカラを持たずとも ウェ:
If those of our blood sing songs of nurture, we will be able to do our part to bring fruitfulness to the Wena Islands, even if we
are not particularly strong.

280689.「ウェディたちの 平和で 豊かな暮らしを\n 守りつづけること。それが\n 王家:
To continue to protect the peaceful and
prosperous lives of the Weddies. It is the
royal family's duty and my wish.

280690.「今のが 思いだしたくない過去……ですか？: Is this the past you don't want to remember?

280691.「……ええ。\n わたくしにとっては 苦しく 耐えがたい……\n けれど 乗り越:
...Yes. For me, it's a painful,
excruciating... yet necessary memory to
overcome.

280692.「盟友さま。この先で 魂の破片を……\n 最後のひとつを 見つけてください。\n:
Ally. I hope you will find the last piece of
my soul. If you do, I...

280693.「行きましょう <pc>。\n リナーシェの言うとおり\n 最後の 魂の破片を:
